thread.title: Jarden to Buy Yearbook Company Jostens in $1.5 Billion Deal
thread.title_full: Jarden to Buy Yearbook Company Jostens in $1.5 Billion Deal - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Jarden to Buy Yearbook Company Jostens in $1.5 Billion Deal
text:
Jarden Corp. said Wednesday that it has reached a $1.5 billion deal to buy Visant Holding Corp., the parent company of yearbook and class-ring business Jostens Inc., from a group of investment funds managed by private-equity firms KKR & Co. and aPriori Capital Partners.
The deal value likely includes debt. A Jarden spokesperson wasnâ€™t...
